titleStmt.title: Discoveries, or, An exploration and explication of some enigmatical verities hitherto not handled by any author viz., in the written Word of God, in the commentaries of the fathers, in the cabal of the stoicks, many choice inferences and unheard of (yet considerable) nicities [sic] never proposed : also A seraphick rhapsodie on the passion of Jesus Christ our sole redeemer / by S. Sheppard.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, S. (Samuel)

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
